Date: Friday, 1/31/1990
Subject: Contract offer
You have to be kidding me with your offer.
Offer more money or I will not even think about it.

Regards,
Darryl Payne

Subject: Progress of Wilmer Bowen

I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Regards,
Kevin O'Neil
